tfsa.note: Withdrawn amounts restored as contribution room the following calendar year

rrsp.note: Contributions reduce taxable income in the year claimed

fhsa.eligible_if: Canadian resident, 18+, has not owned a qualifying home in current year or preceding 4 years
fhsa.tax_treatment: Contributions tax deductible like RRSP, withdrawals tax free like TFSA for qualifying home purchase
fhsa.carry_forward: Unused room carries forward up to $8000 maximum in a single year

capital_gains.note: Gains in registered accounts (TFSA, RRSP, FHSA) are fully sheltered

wealthsimple_specific.margin_note: Margin is only available in self-directed non-registered accounts
wealthsimple_specific.tax_loss_harvesting_note: Only relevant in self-directed non-registered accounts. Managed accounts handle this automatically via Wealthsimple Direct Indexing.
